name: Sticky Header Banner
description: Sticky announcement banner that stays at top or bottom of viewport. Can be dismissed and includes CTA button. Perfect for promotions or announcements.
content:
<script>
(function() {
  var position = '{{POSITION}}';
  var dismissible = {{DISMISSIBLE}};
  
  // Inject CSS
  var style = document.createElement('style');
  style.textContent = '' +
    '.at-sticky-banner { position: fixed; left: 0; right: 0; z-index: 9999; padding: 15px 20px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 20px; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15); }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner.top { top: 0; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner.bottom { bottom: 0; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner.hidden { display: none; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner-content { flex: 1; text-align: center; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 500; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner-cta { padding: 10px 25px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: none; border-radius: 4px; white-space: nowrap; border: none; cursor: pointer; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner-cta:hover { opacity: 0.9; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner-close { background: transparent; border: none; font-size: 24px; cursor: pointer; padding: 0; width: 30px; height: 30px; line-height: 1; opacity: 0.7; }' +
    '.at-sticky-banner-close:hover { opacity: 1; }' +
    '@media (max-width: 768px) {' +
    '  .at-sticky-banner { flex-direction: column; gap: 10px; padding: 12px 15px; }' +
    '  .at-sticky-banner-content { font-size: 14px; }' +
    '  .at-sticky-banner-cta { width: 100%; padding: 12px 20px; }' +
    '  .at-sticky-banner-close { position: absolute; top: 10px; right: 10px; }' +
    '}';
  document.head.appendChild(style);
  
  // Build banner HTML
  var banner = document.createElement('div');
  banner.className = 'at-sticky-banner ' + position;
  banner.style.backgroundColor = '{{BANNER_COLOR}}';
  banner.style.color = '{{TEXT_COLOR}}';
  
  var content = document.createElement('div');
  content.className = 'at-sticky-banner-content';
  content.textContent = '{{MESSAGE}}';
  
  var cta = document.createElement('a');
  cta.className = 'at-sticky-banner-cta';
  cta.href = '{{CTA_URL}}';
  cta.textContent = '{{CTA_TEXT}}';
  cta.style.backgroundColor = '{{CTA_COLOR}}';
  cta.style.color = '{{CTA_TEXT_COLOR}}';
  
  banner.appendChild(content);
  banner.appendChild(cta);
  
  if (dismissible) {
    var closeBtn = document.createElement('button');
    closeBtn.className = 'at-sticky-banner-close';
    closeBtn.innerHTML = '×';
    closeBtn.style.color = '{{TEXT_COLOR}}';
    closeBtn.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Close banner');
    closeBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      banner.classList.add('hidden');
      if (position === 'top') {
        document.body.style.paddingTop = '';
      }
    });
    banner.appendChild(closeBtn);
  }
  
  document.body.appendChild(banner);
  
  // Add padding to body to prevent content overlap
  if (position === 'top') {
    var bannerHeight = banner.offsetHeight;
    document.body.style.paddingTop = bannerHeight + 'px';
  }
})();
</script>

variables.name: {{MESSAGE}}
variables.example: Limited Time: Free Shipping on All Orders!
